c:collection.c:name: Demonstration collection
c:collection.c:description: Collection to demonstrate the features of this application.

c:field.c:usageNotes: Brief text describing what's featured in the photograph and pointing out other interesting features.

A description of the photograph's contents for public consumption that is longer and more detailed than the photograph title. Use complete sentences. Information may be speculative if it is reasonable or provides needed discovery for the image. Be declarative in style rather than asking questions. This field is optional. It is not necessary to repeat information from other fields here if no additional information is available.
Information about the photograph that is for internal use only and should not be shared with the public. Will be searchable in the photo cataloging tool but not by end users.

Date the photograph was taken, in the form YYYY-MM-DD. Supply estimated date if no firm date is known. Can provide year, year/month, or year/month/day. If specific year or decade is unknown, can use the form YYY or YY.
When known, enter the individual or organization that owns the copyright on this image. If unknown, leave this field blank.
Select from a set of predefined statements that describe any restrictions on use that apply to the materials. Leave blank if there are no restrictions placed on use of the image.

Full name of a person pictured. List the name in inverted form: Familyname, Givenname. For the "location of individuals in pictures", enter a description of individuals depicted with information about their location. Use the form "Row 1â€¦Left to Right, 1st, 2nd, ...". Click on the little blue arrow to copy (and normalize) names already entered in the list.
Event depicted in the image. Repeat this field as necessary.
City represented in the image, if known.
State represented in this image, if known.
